items.content_html: react-rv is a lightweight and efficient state management library for React that allows you to create reactive variables and subscribe to them with minimal overhead.
items.title: rasulomaroff/react-rv: react-rv is a lightweight and efficient state management library for React that allows you to create reactive variables and subscribe to them with minimal overhead.

items.content_html: A lightweight, modular particle system using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring moving, filled circular particles with customizable connecting lines (solid, dotted, dashed, dash-dotted).
items.title: 0xHamy/sweet_particles: A lightweight, modular particle system using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring moving, filled circular particles with customizable connecting lines (solid, dotted, dashed, dash-dotted).

items.title: theo-sim-dev/mui-alert-provider: A lightweight provider for creating and managing floating MUI Alert stacks effortlessly.

items.content_html: A lightweight crypto monitoring site that fetches real-time data from the Dexscreener API. Displays token prices and 24h volumes in a responsive table with search functionality. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript perfect for learning API integration and frontend basics.
items.title: CrazyTrader406/Dexsky-net: A lightweight crypto monitoring site that fetches real-time data from the Dexscreener API. Displays token prices and 24h volumes in a responsive table with search functionality. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript perfect for learning API integration and frontend basics.

items.content_html: Lightweight turborepo with modular components, shared configs, containerised deployments and 100% type-safety.
items.title: nktnet1/rt-stack: Lightweight turborepo with modular components, shared configs, containerised deployments and 100% type-safety.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A Node.js/Express RESTful API that queries the GitHub API for user data. Part of the API Explorer project, providing a lightweight backend for the Next.js frontend.
items.title: jpetrucci49/api-explorer-node: A Node.js/Express RESTful API that queries the GitHub API for user data. Part of the API Explorer project, providing a lightweight backend for the Next.js frontend.
